title: What Animals Eat
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 62 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: Cows eat grass, birds eat seeds, and monkeys eat fruit. This is no surprise, but the goat's diet is sure to surprise and delight readers. Patterned text repeats essential high-frequency words while introducing readers to new words.
reviewWords: bugs, crunch, fish, fruit, grass, gulp, leaves, munch, seeds, slurp, zap
awareness: Sound Discrimination                : Discriminate short vowel /a/ sound
